bibl.title: Archaeology and the Dating of Textiles.

Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005
bibl.author: WILD, John Peter

bibl.note: Se réfère aux fouilles de Bérénice (mer Rouge). - P. 18, fig. 1: reproduction d'une lettre privée sur un ostracon du début de l'époque romaine (sans No. d'Inv. et sans transcription).
WILD John Peter, Archaeology and the Dating of Textiles.

Antoine DE MOOR and Cäcilia FLUCK, assisted by Susanne MARTINSSEN-VON FALCK (Edd.), Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries.
